amendment.description: To provide that the limitation on the number of Transportation Security Administration employees shall not apply after the date of enactment of this Act, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4940 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 85 - 12. Record Vote Number: 241.

action.text: Amendment SA 4940 proposed by Senator Lautenberg. (consideration: CR S9337-9339, S9348; text: CR S9337) To provide that the limitation on the number of Transportation Security Administration employees shall not apply after the date of enactment of this Act, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4940 proposed by Senator Lautenberg.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4940 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 85 - 12. Record Vote Number: 241.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4940 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 85 - 12. Record Vote Number: 241.
